Lists.desc: Feature In Metrics Chart New, added ascending sorting for agents and metric names.
Feature In My Usage > Invoice Preview History, Billing History, and Usage, added separate billings by application namespace for Kubernetes products.
Feature In Server List, added the agent name and IP search input.
Feature In Server List, added the pop-up for the file system information.
Feature Improved the project description to be displayed when hovering your mouse over the project list.
Feature Occurrence of real-time notifications can also be checked through the browser.
Feature Added the horizontal line option to the TopN widget of Flex Board.
Feature In Event Configuration, added the event action time.
Lists.details:
• Event Setting V1

    Metrics/composite metrics/outlier detection/composite real-time log/server log → Added them above the event reception tag.

    Hitmap pattern → Added it at the bottom of the card.

  • Event Setting V2

    Basic/metrics → Added to the following items for the resolved notifications.

    The other items are the same as V1.

Lists.desc: Feature In Member List 및 Invite Member, added the feature to display whether MFA and SSO are enabled next to the member email.
Feature In Alert > Notifications, added the custom feature for the Webhook JSON response value in the 3rd party plugin.
Feature When configuring the Alert > Event Configuration metrics events, added the metrics search feature in the category selection, metrics settings, and target event selection steps.
Feature Added the feature to select traces with keyboard arrow keys when the list is focused in the Trace analysis window.
Feature On the Active Transaction screen, a list of active transactions can be downloaded as CSV.
Feature Enhanced the Transaction map past data searching feature.
Lists.details:
• Extended the maximum searchable time range (10 minutes → 1 hour).

  • Adding filter items

    Added filters

    • General filters

    • Referer
      Login ID, WClientId, transaction ID, multi transaction ID, custom TID, error (including class, step, and message), city, country, HTTP method, user agent

    • Trace step-related filters
      DBC, SQL, HTTPC, METHOD, MESSAGE

    • Number input filter
      Elapsed time, HTTP call time, HTTP call count, SQL time, SQL count, status

  • Added display of total number of transactions (read items) searched by the filter data.

  • Added description tooltips for Read and Limit.

  • Added the pause feature when searching the past data.

    • When the search button is clicked while searching the past data (loading), searching is paused.

    • If you search again with the same conditions (time, filter), the data is retrieved from the stopped point.
      (when changing the search conditions, the chart is initialized and a new drawing begins)

Lists.desc: Feature In Dashboard > Server Inventory Map, added display of the event count by status to the popover that appears when the mouse hovers over the server.
Feature In the Dashboard > Server Inventory Map > Display Detail window, added display of state-specific event counts in a popover when hovering the mouse over the server.
Feature In Server List > Server List, the presets can be managed and shared with other users when the Column settings button is clicked.
Feature Added the Server Inventory GPU Count column.
Feature In Metrics Explorer, added the category in which multiple metrics for a single server can be viewed in a chart.
Feature In Report, upon selection of a disk filter template, added the mount point selector UI (e.g. daily hour-based server's key metrics report)
Feature In Server List, added the filter and favorite addition feature.
Feature Upon APP. monitoring, in the Record summary tab of the Trace analysis window, added the container and Pod summary analyzing feature.
Feature When the expand button is clicked on the left of the Node > Node list column, added the disk information.
Feature In Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance and Monitoring Multiple Instances menus, added the sorting priority display when multi-sorting for tables.
Feature In Stat/Report > Database size and Tablespace Size menus, displayed the string as the DB name for the instances other than multi db.
Feature In Stat/Report > SQL Statistics, added the sorting priority display when multi-sorting for tables.
Feature In Laboratory > Top SQL, added the sorting priority display when multi-sorting for tables.
Feature Added the feature to download chart images on the screen.
Lists.details:
• Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance

  • Dashboard > Instance List > Custom widget

  • Analysis > Counts Trend Comparison

Lists.desc: Feature In Dashboard > Monitoring a Database Instance, added new widget editing and preset saving features.
Feature In the Session Table filter, added the key searching feature and alphabetical sorting feature.
Feature Added the Flex Board database widget.
Lists.details:
• CloudWatch instance-based CPU utilization (%)

  • CloudWatch instance-based free memory

  • CloudWatch instance-based free storage

Lists.desc: Feature In the metrics of the Analysis > Wait Analysis menu, added the tooltip where you can check the unit.
Feature In Dashboard > RAC monitoring, modified to save the selected cluster.
Feature Added the installation page.
Feature Added the Stat/Report > Tablespace Size menu.
Feature Added widgets in Integrated Flex Board and Flex Board.
Feature Added the Management > Maintenance Plan menu.
Feature When sharing the Analysis > Error Tracking and User Session Log Search URLs, improved to maintain the status (time, filer, etc).
Lists.details:
• Error Tracking: Time clicked in the time and chart bars.
  • User Session Log Search: Sort by time, filter, oldest time, and latest time.

Lists.desc: Feature In Log Search and Live Tail, added the filter favorite and project sharing features.
Feature When the Log Trend and Log Search logs contain @txid, and @mtid, added the feature to check the trace pop-up through the transaction information drop-down (Log-Trace integrated).

Feature Added the button to move from the trace log to the log search. (The APM pages are integrated that can check the transaction information such as Application dashboard, Transaction map, Transaction Search, and Multiple Transaction Trace)
Feature Improved to maintain the UI status (time, filter, etc) when sharing the Log > Live Tail and Log Trend, Log Search URLs.
Lists.details:
• Live Tail: Category, filter
  • Log Trend: Time clicked in the time, category, and chart bars.
  • Log Search: Sort by time, filter, oldest time, and latest time.
